transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Ji sir, good morning, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Kya badhiya hai lekin aap hamari achchi nahi na lete.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Aap achchi care nahi lete hamare
Executive: Sir aap dekho kal maine aapko video record karke bheja phone search se bhi aur desktop search se bhi jo product aapne jaise search kiya tha na maine bhi waise hi kiya. Mujhe yaha dikh raha hai sir listing.
Customer: Hmm lekin hamara proper listing nahi hua hai kya kuch achcha piche dikh raha hai na humne bhi wo aapko bheja hai na wahi bheja hai na.
Executive: Ussme bhi dekhiye na maine dekha hai to aap
Customer: Aisa hai suniye na customer customer itna hoshiyar thodi hai maine aapko ek hi baat me bola ki aap bolenge kya usko is tarah se search kar rahe har ek customer ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul nahi ye kisne bola aapse?
Customer: Nahi nahi bola nahi fir aapka andaza waise hai na ki bhai is tarah se search kiya to aapko achche se nahi nahi nahi bilkul aisa nahi hai. Aapne jaise search kiya tha.
Executive: Possible hai kya possible hai kya ki waise nahi to direct waha tak bhej dijiye diya karo search karne ki bajay.
Executive: Dekho sir aapne mujhe bola aapne jaise product ka naam search kiya right? Ki aapne wo product search kiya aur bola ki aapko listing nahi dikh raha apna. To maine bhi wahi same product
Customer: Bola nahi maine dikha hai na maine aapko video bheja hai na.
Executive: Wahi wahi wahi matlab aapne video bheja tha usme listing nahi dikh raha tha.
Customer: Maine bola nahi aapko proof with proof pata hai na kya dikh raha tha.
Executive: Same search maine usi same product ka naam jaise aapne bola na jaise client search karega aapka unko pata waise hi maine search kiya maine apne tarike se kuch search nahi kiya na IndiaMART ke tarike se kuch search kiya. Product ka naam jaise 13 rod abacus teacher aapko automatic ek sense aa jata hai wo unknowingly ek unconscious way se aap usi taraf galti se galat nahi kuch search karenge.
Customer: Achcha ye sab samajhte hain sab samajhte hain.
Executive: Fir to sir dekho main category me to humne apna preferred star le hi rakha hai. Agar koi bhi ke sath liya to wo kaise hua ye aapko bas ye karna hai search out karna hai dekhna hai ki are yaar really bande ne search kare uska naam nahi dikh raha baat wo with proof ke sath bol rahe hain aap bolenge ki aisa search karo waisa search karo.
Customer: Nahi sir maine bola hi nahi wo to maine aapko bola hi nahi ki aap aisa search karo aisa search karo aapki baat mai galat sabit kar hi nahi rahi hu. Aapne jis product ke naam se search kiya right aapne koi product ka naam hi to dala tha na sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan right maine bhi same product ka naam haan same product ka naam aur aapko dekho aapki video me hi maine aapko fir screenshot bheja tha ki hamara naam aa raha hai ye jo aapne mujhe bheja tha isme aap dekho ye dikh nahi raha wooden 30 rod master teacher abacus green raise abacus academy apna dekho aapka screenshot me maine wapas se aapko tag kiya tha. Apna listing aa to raha hai sir.
Executive: Dekhiye phone searches me alag dikhta hai aur jab website searches pe alag dikhta hai lekin aapki location
Customer: 99% log abhi sab search mobile pe karte hain isiliye karta hu main khud batata hu ki main main apne laptop mere paas pada hua hai mere samne rehta lekin main usme search nahi karta check nahi karta main apne IndiaMART mobile pe karta hu.
Executive: Sahi keh rahe ho aap mobile pe karte hain 99% log idhar bahut 1% 2% honge ki jo jayenge laptop pe ya fir desktop pe ya search karenge.
Executive: Agreed sir even hum bhi yahi yahi bolte hain isiliye hum bhi aapko preferred star ki jo service di hai na wo isiliye di hai ki jisse aapka jo Amravati ka GST hai uske bahar jitni bhi locations hai waha aapki na visibility aaye kyuki jaise Delhi me approximately aapke product line me jo deal karte hain wo 40 supplier honge 40 se chalo 15 20 supplier mai pakad leti hu theek hai aapko maine apne phone se search karke dikhaya tha ki mera current location greater Noida wo fetch kar raha tha jitne bhi Delhi aur aas pass ke the Faridabad kyuki phone me na sir aas pass ke searches wale pehle dikh jate hain aap dekhoge Faridabad ke GST ke baad seedha hamara raise abacus academy aa raha tha wo preferred star ki service ki wajah se aa raha tha nahi to fir mujhe Delhi ke aur bhi supplier dikhte alag supplier bhi dikhte right to jitne bhi upar se dikh rahe the na wo hamare sath ke the ab uske baad hum dikh rahe the aise hi koi bhi kisi bhi location se search karta hai usko teen char supplier pehle GST wale dikh jate hain jinka GST hai waha ka fir star aur leader wale supplier dikh jate hain jo waha pe buylead consume kar rahe hain jinhone wo location apni preferred bana rakhi hai.
Executive: Sir ye listing me sir proper hai mai kaam kar rahi hu aap uske liye nishchint rahiye wo meri taraf se sari cheeze up to dated hai jitne product usme add hone chahiye aur properly jitni listing honi chahiye groups maine fir se check kiye hain groups bhi change kiye maine agar aapko kahi bhi lag raha hai to aap mujhe wo batao aisa nahi hai ki mai acknowledge nahi karungi.
Customer: Nahi aa raha sir aap aap waha pe dekhiye abhi ek ho gaya lekin wo dikh nahi raha dusri baat ye ho gayi ki hamare ko lead dekhiye kitna aa raha hai to dekho kitna lead aa raha hai dekho aap bhi khud dekho kya lead aaya hai. Abhi dekho abhi sab abhi aap karte hain kal kya kiya tha parso kya kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab dekho jaise aapne 9 se 15 me 28 buylead uthai thi 9 se 15 tarikh me aur dikhao abhi abhi aaj kaunsi lead aaye bata dekho kaunsi kitne kitne bulk me lead aaye dekho bataiye to.
Executive: Abhi mai ek minute dekho matlab sabhi dekho aur abhi to aapko kuch pata nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa baat nahi hai aapko jaise kuch to pata nahi hai hamare bare me aapko.
Executive: Abhi jaise ye kal ki ek buylead dikh rahi hai mujhe 17 rod student abacus tirur pure Maharashtra ki 21 hours ago matlab kal ki hai 530 ki requirement thi inki ye buylead aapne consume kari thi.
Customer: Nahi kiya.
Executive: Sir hamari kal ki hi ek hai tikam tikam grah Madhya Pradesh ke school library books for CBSE wo nahi hai na wo nahi hai na haan wo nahi hai theek hai CBSE books ke liye aayi wo kya fir ek abacus ki kuch nahi teen buylead mujhe bulk ki dikhi hai sir teen buylead bulk ki dikhi hai chaliye mai isko dekh leti hu par teen bulk ki mujhe dikhi hai sir to ho sakta hai unse miss out ho gaye ho lekin rest haan ek mujhe dikh rahi hai kal ki hai Dehradun Uttarakhand ki.
Executive: Buyleads ka mai dekh leti hu.
Customer: Sir queries aayi hai aap waisi dekh leti hai bolte aur guys kyu nahi aa rahi to waha pe result hai ki wo search hi nahi ho raha apna yahi nahi ho raha apni company ke product sahi nahi aa rahi very simple.
Executive: Sir buylead ka dikhne se kya talluk hai mai to maine aapko pehle hi bataya tha.
Customer: Lead hi nahi raha dikh nahi raha samne wale log ko to wo kaise apna ye karega.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe batao kal aapko ek inquiry aayi thi inquiry for first level abacus book from Swati by IndiaMART is inquiry se baat hui ye dekho sir hamari listing ka benefit yaha mil raha hai hame 20 tarikh ko aapko ek inquiry ye inquiry aayi thi inse baat hui aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Aur fir aapko ek I am interested in plastic 17 rod from student abacus Prashant se aayi thi aap lead manager check kariye sir waha pe direct inquiries aati hain customer ne aapki profile dekhi aapko directly approach kiya kyuki aisa nahi hai na IndiaMART aapko sirf ek hi mode se business de raha hai buylead se preferred star humne liya hai.
Customer: Dekho na dekho na aap dekho na kya lead aa rahi hai kitni aa rahi hai dekhiye aap zara kitne lead apan ne de chuke hain chalo mai maan leti hu mere ko bolne ke liye mere ko aap ye kar rahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir chalo mai maan leti hu is mahine aapka lead ka approval to fir aap kya karenge mere ko batao paise wapas denge kya aap mere sath baat kar aapko jo dikha hai usme dekho na kya bol raha hai samne wala.
Executive: Aapne buylead ka mujhe issue bataya mai usko acknowledge kar rahi hu maine bhi bataya aapko ki is mahine flow thoda sa down hai aapka market bhi slow rehta hai is mahine.
Customer: Thoda thoda nahi nahi kuch nahi rehta sab sabhi jagah pe business chal raha hai bhai mera nahi chal raha aur mere ko main isliye wahi to search karke dekha tha are ye to apna naam hi nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sir naam to aa raha hai maine aapko bhi screen recording karke bheja.
Customer: Maine aapko diya na video video bheju kya mai fir se wahi video bheju kya.
Executive: Sir usi video ko na maine screenshot karke bhi aapko bheja.
Customer: Wo galat hai kya wo video?
Executive: Sir aapne jo video bheja usme aapki company ka naam dikh raha hai aap dekho maine aapko screenshot karke bhi bheja.
Customer: Sabse aakhri me sabse aakhri me.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Sabse aakhri me?
Executive: Nahi aakhri me nahi top five me to dikh hi raha hai sir.
Customer: Sir gino to upar se five me top five me hai.
Customer: Ginti meri ginti nahi aati mere ko achche se.
Executive: Sorry sir?
Customer: Gino to upar se kitna aata hai kaunse number pe aayi hai to.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Aap us video me bol rahe ho na jo video aapne mujhe bheja tha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Wahi video ki baat kare dekho aapko pata bhi nahi kaunsi video ki baat kare aap connect bhi nahi properly hai na cheezon ke sath.
Executive: Sir maine bhi to aapko kai sari video bheji thi aapne dekhi meri video.
Customer: Wo nahi dekhna mere ko mere ko jo problem hai usse main jo problem nahi hai usse nahi karna hai apne ko samajh rahe ki nahi madam aise.
Executive: Achcha aap ye keh rahe ho ki aapke aate hain lekin nahi aate jo nahi aate isliye hum IndiaMART pe gaya jo problems hai jo problems hai uske kaam karna hai jo problem nahi hai uske upar problem kaam nahi karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai mai aapki problem samajh rahi hu aapko ek top visibility chahiye plus buylead ka issue aap bata rahe ho bulk ka.
Customer: Paise liye hai na waise kaise baat kare visibility chahiye kya aapko paise diye us hisab se aana bhi chahiye na chahiye mere ko nahi chahiye main aapne paise liye uske liye.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Listing not showing properly.

- Buyleads are not coming in bulk.

- Wants top visibility.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about preferred star benefits.

- Executive informed about the listing process.

- Executive assured to check the buyleads issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, buyleads, preferred star, visibility
